# NETWORK::NETWORK_SET_TEAM_ONLY_CHAT

## Summary
Enables/disables team-only chat.  Applies only to in-game chat, not lobby chat

## Parameters
* **BOOL** teamOnlyChat

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Team-only chat is disabled by default.
